author: bitmastercoin
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

As an avid Mac OS user I would like to see powershell to be incorporated into the Mac OS.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Please clarify your request since there already is PowerShell installer for MacOs.

comments.author: ArmaanMcleod
comments.body:
Did you check the MacOS installation guide? https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/install/installing-powershell-on-macos?view=powershell-7.2
Installing PowerShell on macOS - PowerShell
Information about installing PowerShell on macOS

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Mac OS powershell
